title: Covid restrictions hit iPhone maker Foxconn
description: The electronics manufacturer says its revenue in November is down 11% compared to the same month in 2021.

title: Meta, Amazon, Twitter layoffs: 'Tech layoffs will not destroy our American dreams'
description: Surbhi Gupta, who was laid off in the US, on the uncertainties she and other visa holders are dealing with.

title: Taiwan's front-line battle against mobile phone fraud
description: How Taiwanese phone fraud fighters are able to warn the world about the latest scams.
